description: Top 30 entities with refs for instant context recovery
Historical issues + solutions linked to entities

\"Single block execution always returned.solution: "Auth token was being read from wrong localStorage key. Changed from 'auth_token' to 'nop-auth' with proper JSON parsing (same pattern as workflowStore)"

\"END scripts not reading session data\".solution: "Added standalone YAML parser to all 4 scripts with workflow log priority"

\"Scripts ran before workflow log create.solution: "Changed END phase order: Create Log → Run Scripts"

\"START node never showed green/complete.solution: "Backend was tracking status correctly but WebSocket completion event didn't include final nodeStatuses - added nodeStatuses to execution_completed event"

\"All executed nodes incorrectly marked.problem: "All executed nodes incorrectly marked as skipped"
\"All executed nodes incorrectly marked.solution: "Empty object {} from exec.node_statuses was truthy, causing || operator to return {} instead of exec.nodeStatuses - fixed with Object.keys().length check"

\"App freezes when clicking template in.problem: "App freezes when clicking template in flow page"
\"App freezes when clicking template in.solution: "isRightClickSelecting state was never reset to false - removed problematic state management"

\"Template blocks don't appear on canvas.problem: "Template blocks don't appear on canvas after click"
\"Template blocks don't appear on canvas.solution: "optimizeTemplateLayout was causing issues - disabled, using original hand-designed positions"

\"Connection context menu not appearing.problem: "Connection context menu not appearing on left-click"
\"Connection context menu not appearing.solution: "Fixed DOM ordering (backdrop before menus), added pointer-events-none to legend, added linkCanvasObjectMode='replace', added right-click support"

\"Entities with no visible connections i.problem: "Entities with no visible connections in memviz"
\"Entities with no visible connections i.solution: "Fixed import parsing + added layer relations at beginning"

\"Agent not seeing layer structure\".solution: "Restructured file: headers → layer entities → layer relations → code"

\"Sub-optimal cache/gotcha configuration.solution: "4.2M session simulation identified cache=30, gotcha=30 as optimal. Reduces tokens by 15%, improves hit rate by 8.2%"

\"Dropdown flickering on every render\".solution: "Added hasLoaded state guard and loadingRef to prevent useEffect re-triggering"

\"3-output blocks didn't display all 3 h.problem: "3-output blocks didn't display all 3 handles properly in UI"
\"3-output blocks didn't display all 3 h.solution: "Updated BlockNode.tsx handle positioning to use percentages and auto-scale block height based on handle count"

\"Templates used undefined block types c.problem: "Templates used undefined block types causing build failures"
\"Templates used undefined block types c.solution: "Audited all templates, removed duplicates, aligned with BlockType union in workflow.ts"

\"Backend had no handlers for new data.*.problem: "Backend had no handlers for new data.* block types"
\"Backend had no handlers for new data.*.solution: "Added 4 block type handlers with proper pass/fail/output returns, created safe code evaluator"

\"Right-click selection not working\".solution: "Changed from right-click to Shift+drag selection which is standard UX pattern"

Agent template had duplicate `except Exc.problem: Agent template had duplicate `except Exception` block causing syntax error
Agent template had duplicate `except Exc.solution: Removed duplicate exception block in agent_service.py

Skipped session end protocol scripts (ge.problem: Skipped session end protocol scripts (generate_codemap, suggest_skill)
Skipped session end protocol scripts (ge.solution: Updated protocols to emphasize RE-READ requirement, added Anti-Drift Rules

Misplaced documentation files scattered.problem: Misplaced documentation files scattered across repo
Misplaced documentation files scattered.solution: Added 4c repository cleanup step as mandatory

Partial deletion of modal code created u.problem: Partial deletion of modal code created unclosed JSX tags
Partial deletion of modal code created u.solution: Complete removal of duplicate sidebar block and all modal references

project_knowledge.json + skills/INDEX.md.solution: Context now pre-attached, no explicit reads needed

Same skill reloaded multiple times per s.problem: Same skill reloaded multiple times per session
Same skill reloaded multiple times per s.solution: Load skill ONCE per domain, cache loaded list

Always run generate_codemap.py even for.problem: Always run generate_codemap.py even for docs-only
Always run generate_codemap.py even for.solution: Run scripts based on file types edited

\"24 gotchas from logs not in quality.in.problem: "24 gotchas from logs not in quality.instructions.md"
\"24 gotchas from logs not in quality.in.solution: "Added 9 new unique gotchas to quality checklist"

** SQLAlchemy not detecting JSONB field.problem: ** SQLAlchemy not detecting JSONB field modifications
